page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT IN EARDISLEY
page.content: There is a small{dairy}in Eardisley.It does not bottle{milk},it receives milk from a dairy in Hereford and distributes it for about 8km. around Eardisley in a Morris van.They deliver school milk to our school,skimmed milk,sterilised milk,Channel Island milk and ordinary milk.They deliver about 280pints of milk a day.The lady starts work at 4.30a.m.THe milk arrives at the dairy at 9.30a.m.ready to deliver the next day.They also sell cream,pop,eggs and fruit juice. The abbatoir in Eardisley is 21yrs.old being modernised 10yrs.ago.35 people work there,women work in the office. The{abbatoir}works from 6.00a.m.-7.00p.m.The animals are electrocuted.The hides go to Spain.The meat is put in refrigerated lorries which travel as far as London.The meat comes from local farms.
